instructions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-low heat and lightly oil grate.
In a large bowl, combine turkey, zucchini, onion, egg, bread crumbs, Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper. Mix until well incorporated.
Form mixture into six evenly-sized patties and grill until no longer pink in the middle, about eight minutes per side.
title: Zurkey Burgers
sentences: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-low heat and lightly oil grate.
In a large bowl, combine turkey, zucchini, onion, egg, bread crumbs, Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper.
Form mixture into six evenly-sized patties and grill until no longer pink in the middle, about eight minutes per side.
